newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Russian minister unaware when PGM talks to resume.
newsitem.headline: Russian minister unaware when PGM talks to resume.

text.p: Russian Natural Resources Minister Viktor Orlov said on Tuesday he was unaware when stalled palladium and platinum shipments to Japan might begin.

"I can't answer that question because I am not aware of what is happening with this (platinum and palladium shipments to Japan)," he told a news conference when asked for a date when formal talks on delayed deliveries might begin.
"It's clearly a question for other ministries," said Orlov, whose brief includes the precious metals sector. He gave no further details.
Russian supplies of platinum group metals to Japan have been on hold since the beginning of the year and industry officials have said they are awaiting a government decree to authorise shipments.
Russia is the world's largest palladium producer and Japan the biggest consumer.
